nodes.text: Reneget Vause, known as the Serpent of the Void, Sarlacc in Scales, or Hunter of Worlds, was a dangerous Trandoshan male Pirate Lord who was active during the Galactic War.

During the Cold War, Reneget stalked the farthest reaches of space. Eventually, he became the target of a bounty hunter. After the first encounter, the bounty hunter tracked down his other captains and rival in order to lure him into a fight. In the end, the bounty hunter had the choice of either capturing him alive and stripping him of all his Scorekeeper points, or fighting him to the death and letting him die honorably.
